channel.title: [PI]Shadow/Shaded text in yell[PI]
channel.description: I really want to know how to have text shaded in yell for [b]Project Insanity[/b]. I've tried for example: " ::yell @gre@ <shad=4856312> " Is there any way to have shaded text using '@'? Thanks.

item.title: [PI]Shadow/Shaded text in yell[PI]
item.dc:creator: @gangsta_tony gangsta tony
item.description:
@gangsta_tony wrote:

I really want to know how to have text shaded in yell for Project Insanity. I’ve tried for example: " ::yell @gre@ <shad=4856312> " Is there any way to have shaded text using ‘@’? Thanks.

Read full topic
